answers.answer: Good luck!! I had to do the 3 hour test and believe me, I thought I was going to throw up!! Thankfully, I didn't!
In a side note the sugary drink is making my little Eli start beating me up. Lol. I still love feeling his movements!

I fail my 1 hr test....I pass my 3 hr test...Omg the 3hr glucose tolerance juice is sooo sweet..it has more sugar than the 1 hr juice...=(I felt really anxious after drinking that juice...1hr 50mg3hr 100mgHey take some snacks ... You might feel dizzy after the 3hrs...Good luck x

2nd test was 1 hour a was the first. passed the first a little high on the second. . . Meeting with perinatology today. From what the doctor said at my last appt I probably will be put back on met formin and given a glucometer. :( a little nervous and been a little depressed about this. Any advise?

question: Not really a question, more or less just bored. Sitting at my 2nd glucose test. Apparently pcos makes it so you are high risk for diabetes, and even though I tested beautifully the 1st time, I need to drink the nasties again. Blah. The Dr. said if this time is off then will need a glucometer and to test every meal. Here's hoping the nasty drink digest beautifully!How are you all today.
title: 2nd glucose test
